snippet: Like “sport” or “champ” of an earlier era, “buddy” has quietly evolved into the go-to nickname for American parents looking to chum it up with their kids.
abstract: Like term 'sport' or 'champ' of an earlier era, 'buddy' has quietly evolved over the last 20 years into the go-to nickname for American parents, particularly fathers, looking to chum it up with their sons and daughters.
lead_paragraph: Like “sport” or “champ” of an earlier era, “buddy” has quietly evolved into the go-to nickname for American parents looking to chum it up with their kids.

headline.seo: Parents Choose ‘Buddy’ As a Nickname for Their Children
headline.main: More Than a Son, He’s My Buddy
headline.print_headline: More Than a Son, He’s My Buddy
